meta.evidence_base: Prompts based on therapeutic journaling research (Pennebaker expressive writing, CBT thought records, DBT diary cards)
meta.tarot_integration: All prompts can be used with or without tarot cards - cards provide archetypal entry point

00_the_fool.card_meaning: New beginnings, innocence, leap of faith, potential, adventure
prompts: What new beginning am I standing at the edge of? What would it look like to take that leap?
Where in my life am I being called to embrace beginner's mind?
What would I do if I trusted that the net will appear?
What am I carrying that I need to set down before this new journey?
If I had the Fool's innocence, what would I try without fear of failure?
What adventure is my heart calling me toward, even if my mind says it's impractical?
00_the_fool.cbt_connection: Challenge catastrophizing - what if the risk is worth it?
00_the_fool.dbt_connection: Wise Mind - balancing excitement with wisdom
00_the_fool.therapeutic_focus: Embracing uncertainty, calculated risk-taking, beginner's mind

prompts: What tools and skills do I already possess that I've been underutilizing?
What do I want to manifest in my life? What's the first small step?
Where am I waiting for permission when I already have the power?
What would I create if I fully believed in my abilities?
How can I use what's 'on my table' (my existing resources) more intentionally?
What skill am I developing? How does practice feel different from when I started?
01_the_magician.cbt_connection: Disqualifying the positive - acknowledging your existing competence
01_the_magician.dbt_connection: Accumulating Positive Experiences - using skills intentionally

02_the_high_priestess.card_meaning: Intuition, inner wisdom, unconscious, mystery, receptivity
prompts: What does my intuition know that my logical mind is ignoring?
What truth am I not ready to consciously acknowledge yet?
When I sit in stillness, what voice emerges?
What pattern keeps repeating? What is it trying to teach me?
Where do I need to stop seeking external answers and trust my inner knowing?
What mystery in my life am I trying to solve that might be better honored?
What does my body know that my mind hasn't caught up to yet?
02_the_high_priestess.cbt_connection: Emotional reasoning - but also validating gut feelings vs. automatic thoughts
02_the_high_priestess.therapeutic_focus: Trusting intuition, honoring the unconscious, receptivity

03_the_empress.card_meaning: Nurturing, abundance, creativity, growth, mother energy
prompts: How am I nurturing myself? How would I like to nurture myself better?
What am I growing/creating in my life right now?
Where do I need to be more generous with myself?
What would unconditional self-love look like today?
How can I tend to my own needs the way I tend to others?
What is fertile and ready to bloom in my life?
If I treated myself with the care I give to those I love, what would change?
03_the_empress.dbt_connection: ABC PLEASE - accumulating positive experiences, building mastery

prompts: What boundaries do I need to set or reinforce?
Where in my life do I need more structure?
What am I avoiding taking authority over?
How do I relate to discipline - as punishment or as self-care?
Where do I need to lead instead of waiting for someone else?
What would healthy, compassionate self-discipline look like?
What structure would support my goals without feeling like prison?
04_the_emperor.cbt_connection: Should statements - reframing discipline as choice

05_the_hierophant.card_meaning: Tradition, learning, meaning-making, spiritual practice, conformity vs. rebellion
prompts: What tradition or practice gives my life meaning?
What am I learning about myself through this experience?
Where do I conform when I should question? Where do I rebel when I should listen?
What spiritual or philosophical framework helps me make sense of life?
Who are my teachers (formal or informal)? What are they teaching me?
What values guide my life? Are they truly mine or inherited?
How do I find meaning in suffering?
05_the_hierophant.cbt_connection: Core beliefs - examining inherited vs. chosen beliefs
05_the_hierophant.dbt_connection: Wise Mind - integrating tradition and personal truth

prompts: What choice am I facing? What do my values say?
Where am I out of alignment with my values?
What parts of myself need integration (shadow and light, logical and emotional)?
What relationship (with self or other) needs attention?
What am I choosing between? What would each choice cost? What would each offer?
How do I show love to myself? How would I like to?
Where do I need to choose myself?
06_the_lovers.cbt_connection: Decision-making - examining evidence for each option
06_the_lovers.dbt_connection: Wise Mind - integrating emotion and reason in choices

07_the_chariot.card_meaning: Willpower, determination, direction, discipline, victory through effort
prompts: What am I moving toward? Is it where I truly want to go?
What opposing forces within me do I need to harness together?
Where do I need to exert willpower without becoming rigid?
What victory have I been working toward? Am I acknowledging progress?
How do I maintain direction when obstacles appear?
What momentum am I building? How can I sustain it?
Where do I confuse control with direction?

08_strength.card_meaning: Courage, compassion, inner strength, gentle power, taming the beast
prompts: What fear am I being called to face with courage?
Where do I need to be gentle with my own 'inner beast'?
What does strength-through-compassion look like vs. strength-through-force?
What part of myself am I trying to dominate that I should befriend?
Where have I been stronger than I knew?
How can I approach this challenge with both courage AND kindness?
What would it mean to be soft and strong at the same time?
08_strength.dbt_connection: Opposite Action - facing fear with courage

09_the_hermit.card_meaning: Solitude, inner wisdom, reflection, seeking truth, withdrawal
prompts: What do I need solitude to discover?
What truth am I seeking?
How do I feel about being alone with myself?
What would I learn if I withdrew from noise for a while?
What light am I carrying that could guide others?
Where do I need to seek answers within instead of outside?
What wisdom have I gained from my journey so far?
09_the_hermit.cbt_connection: Mind reading - trusting your own experience
09_the_hermit.dbt_connection: Observe and Describe - witnessing without judgment

10_wheel_of_fortune.card_meaning: Change, cycles, fate vs. free will, ups and downs, turning points
prompts: What is changing in my life right now? How do I feel about it?
What cycle am I in (beginning, middle, end)? What does this phase require?
Where do I have control? Where do I need to surrender?
What pattern keeps repeating? What is my role in the cycle?
How do I respond when the wheel turns down? When it turns up?
What would acceptance of life's inherent changeability feel like?
What is this turning point teaching me?
10_wheel_of_fortune.therapeutic_focus: Acceptance of change, understanding cycles, agency vs. surrender

11_justice.card_meaning: Fairness, truth, accountability, cause and effect, balance
prompts: Where do I need to take accountability?
What truth am I avoiding?
How do I balance self-compassion with self-accountability?
What consequences am I facing? What choices led here?
Where have I been unjust to myself or others?
What needs to be brought into balance?
How do I respond when life feels unfair?
11_justice.dbt_connection: Nonjudgmental Stance while still acknowledging consequences

12_the_hanged_man.card_meaning: Surrender, new perspective, sacrifice, pause, seeing differently
prompts: What would I see if I looked at this situation upside-down?
What do I need to surrender?
What 'sacrifice' is actually freeing me?
How does this pause/waiting serve me?
What if this delay is protection, not punishment?
Where am I struggling against what I can't control?
What perspective shift am I resisting?
12_the_hanged_man.cbt_connection: Mental filter - seeing ONLY the negative in waiting

13_death.card_meaning: Transformation, endings, release, rebirth, letting go
prompts: What is ending in my life? How do I feel about it?
What do I need to let die so something new can be born?
How do I grieve endings?
What transformation am I resisting?
What would I be if I let go of this old identity?
What needs to be released? What makes that hard?
How am I different than I was a year ago? Five years ago?
What extremes in my life need balancing?
How can I practice moderation without deprivation?
What opposing parts of myself need integration?
Where do I need patience?
What is being alchemized in me right now?
How do I find the middle way between extremes?
What would 'just right' look like (not too much, not too little)?

15_the_devil.card_meaning: Shadow, addiction, materialism, bondage, unhealthy attachment
prompts: What am I chained to? How are the chains self-imposed?
What shadow part of myself am I denying?
Where am I seeking pleasure in ways that harm me?
What addiction (substance, behavior, thought pattern) has power over me?
What would freedom from this attachment look like?
How do I use _____ to avoid feeling _____?
What part of myself am I afraid to look at?
15_the_devil.cbt_connection: Identifying automatic thoughts that enable unhealthy patterns
15_the_devil.dbt_connection: Mindfulness of current emotion - what am I avoiding?
15_the_devil.therapeutic_focus: Shadow work, addiction awareness, healthy boundaries

16_the_tower.card_meaning: Sudden change, crisis, breakdown/breakthrough, revelation, upheaval
prompts: What illusion is crumbling? What truth is being revealed?
How do I respond to sudden change?
What was I building on shaky foundation?
In what way is this crisis also an opportunity?
What needs to fall apart so something better can be built?
How have past crises changed me? What did I learn?
What can I control right now, in this moment?
16_the_tower.cbt_connection: Catastrophizing - crisis is painful AND survivable
16_the_tower.therapeutic_focus: Crisis response, resilience, finding meaning in chaos

prompts: What am I hoping for?
How am I healing? What supports my healing?
What inspires me?
Where is renewal happening in my life?
What would it feel like to have faith that things will work out?
How do I reconnect with hope when I've lost it?
What light is guiding me through darkness?
17_the_star.cbt_connection: Mental filter - seeing possibility, not just problems

prompts: What am I afraid of? Is the fear based in reality or projection?
What is my unconscious trying to tell me through dreams, slips, patterns?
Where am I confusing illusion with reality?
What do I need to illuminate?
How do I navigate when I can't see the path clearly?
What shadow am I walking through?
What does my anxiety want me to know?

19_the_sun.card_meaning: Joy, vitality, success, clarity, inner child
prompts: What brings me pure joy?
Where in my life is there vitality and aliveness?
What success (big or small) can I celebrate?
What has become clear recently?
How does my inner child want to play?
Where am I taking life too seriously?
What would I do if I allowed myself to be radiantly happy?
What am I being called to?
How am I being reborn/transformed?
What needs my honest evaluation?
What past version of myself am I releasing?
What is my 'higher calling'?
How do I answer when life calls me to grow?
What have I learned from my journey so far?
What cycle am I completing?
How have I integrated the lessons of my journey?
What achievement deserves celebration?
Where do I feel whole? Where do I still feel fragmented?
What does 'home' feel like now?
How am I different from who I was at the start of this journey?
What new beginning awaits after this completion?
21_the_world.dbt_connection: Mindfulness of current moment - honoring arrival

prompts: What new emotional beginning or relationship is emerging?
How am I opening my heart?
What would it feel like to let love in?
Where do I need to fill my own cup first?
What relationship (romantic, friendship, self) needs attention?
Where am I finding mutual support?
How do I show up in partnership?
What does equal exchange look like?
What do I have to celebrate with others?
Who is my chosen family/community?
How do I contribute to my community's joy?
Where do I need more social connection?
What opportunity am I not seeing because I'm focused on what's missing?
Where am I checked out emotionally?
What gift is being offered that I'm refusing?
How do I re-engage with life when feeling numb?
What loss am I grieving?
Can I turn around to see what remains?
How do I hold both grief AND gratitude?
What am I ruminating on instead of processing?
What childhood memory or pattern is present now?
How does my inner child need care today?
What innocence have I lost? What have I gained?
Where do I find nostalgia vs. being stuck in the past?
What options am I overwhelmed by?
Which choice is fantasy vs. which is real possibility?
How do I discern between desires?
Where do I need to commit instead of daydream?
What am I walking away from?
What is no longer serving me?
How do I know when to leave vs. when to stay?
What am I seeking that requires me to leave comfort behind?
What wish has been fulfilled?
What am I satisfied with?
How do I celebrate emotional abundance?
Where can I allow myself to feel content?
What does emotional fulfillment look like for me?
Where do I find 'home' (physical or emotional)?
How do I create family (chosen or blood)?
What would harmony in my relationships look like?
What new feeling or creative impulse is emerging?
How do I approach emotions with curiosity?
What message does my heart have for me?
Where can I be more emotionally open?
What am I being called to pursue emotionally?
How do I balance romance/idealism with reality?
What creative quest am I on?
Where do I lead with my heart?
How do I nurture my emotional life?
Where do I need to trust my intuition?
How do I hold space for my own feelings?
What does emotional mastery look like?
How do I lead with emotional wisdom?
Where do I balance feeling deeply with remaining steady?
How do I master my emotions without suppressing them?
What does emotional maturity mean to me?

minor_arcana_swords.note: Swords = thoughts, communication, truth, conflict, clarity

prompts: What new clarity or truth is cutting through?
What do I need to communicate?
Where do I need to use my mind as a tool?
What breakthrough understanding am I having?
What decision am I avoiding?
How am I blocking information I need?
Where am I at a stalemate?
What would it take to remove the blindfold?
What heartbreak am I processing?
How do I allow myself to feel grief?
What painful truth needs acknowledgment?
How do I heal from this hurt?
Where do I need rest?
How do I recover from mental exhaustion?
What would true restoration look like?
Am I resting or avoiding?
What conflict did I 'win' but feel badly about?
Where have I prioritized being right over being kind?
What does defeat teach me?
How do I handle winning/losing with grace?
What am I moving away from? Toward?
How do I navigate transitions?
What do I carry with me through change?
Who is guiding me through troubled waters?
Where am I being less than honest?
What am I stealing from myself (time, joy, truth)?
How do I navigate situations that require strategy?
What secret am I keeping? From others? From myself?
What am I trapped by? How is it self-imposed?
What thoughts are binding me?
What would I see if I took the blindfold off?
What first small step toward freedom can I take?
What am I catastrophizing about?
What's keeping me up at night?
How much of this worry is based in reality?
What would help me find peace with uncertainty?
What has reached rock bottom?
How do I let this be the end instead of continuing to suffer?
What new beginning waits beyond this ending?
How do I surrender when I've been defeated?
What new idea or truth am I discovering?
How do I approach learning?
Where can I be more curious?
What question needs asking?
Where am I charging ahead without thinking?
How do I balance speed with wisdom?
What truth am I fighting for?
Where do I need to slow down?
How do I speak my truth with clarity and compassion?
Where do I need to set clear boundaries?
How do I balance discernment with kindness?
What does it mean to be both sharp and loving?
How do I use my intellect wisely?
Where do I need to make a fair, logical decision?
How do I lead with clarity and ethics?
What does mental mastery mean to me?

minor_arcana_wands.note: Wands = passion, creativity, energy, action, will

prompts: What creative spark or new passion is igniting?
What do I feel called to create or start?
Where is my energy focused?
What would I do with unlimited energy and courage?
What future am I planning?
How do I balance vision with action?
What are my options? Which calls to me?
Where do I stand at a crossroads of potential?
What have I set in motion?
How do I wait for results with active patience?
What partnerships or collaborations are forming?
What distant goal am I working toward?
What foundation have I built?
What milestone deserves celebration?
How do I create stability while honoring freedom?
Where do I find 'home' and celebration?
What conflict or competition am I in?
Is this struggle productive or destructive?
How do I navigate differing opinions/goals?
Where is healthy challenge vs. unnecessary drama?
What victory or recognition have I earned?
How do I celebrate success with humility?
What journey led to this achievement?
How do I handle being in the spotlight?
What am I defending? Is it worth defending?
Where do I need to stand my ground?
How do I maintain my position with integrity?
What am I fighting for?
What is moving quickly in my life?
How do I handle rapid change/progress?
What communication or action is in flight?
Where do I need to keep up momentum?
What am I exhausted from defending/fighting?
Where do I find resilience when I'm weary?
How do I protect myself without becoming paranoid?
What strength remains for the final push?
What burdens am I carrying that aren't mine?
Where have I taken on too much?
What can I delegate or release?
How did I get here? What was the first yes that led to this overwhelm?
What new adventure or project excites me?
How do I approach new passions?
Where can I be more spontaneous?
What message of inspiration do I have?
Where am I impulsive vs. passionate?
How do I channel my fire constructively?
What adventure am I charging toward?
Where do I need to temper enthusiasm with planning?
How do I embody my creative power?
Where do I lead with charisma and warmth?
How do I balance confidence with humility?
What does owning my fire look like?
How do I lead with vision and inspiration?
Where do I take bold action?
How do I master my creative/passionate energy?
What legacy am I building?

minor_arcana_pentacles.note: Pentacles = material world, body, work, resources, health, security

prompts: What new opportunity (work, health, financial) is emerging?
How am I planting seeds for future abundance?
What does security mean to me?
What gift from the material world am I receiving?
What am I juggling? How sustainable is this?
How do I find balance in practical life?
What priorities need adjusting?
Where am I adaptable vs. scattered?
What am I building/creating with others?
How do I contribute my skills to shared work?
Where am I learning mastery through practice?
What collaboration is strengthening my work?
What am I holding too tightly?
Where is my need for security becoming rigidity?
How do I balance saving with spending?
What would it feel like to loosen my grip?
Where do I feel lack or scarcity?
What resources am I not seeing (the lit window)?
How do I ask for help when I need it?
Where is my focus on what's missing vs. what remains?
How do I give and receive?
Where am I in balance with generosity?
What resources can I share?
How do I accept help gracefully?
What have I been working on? What's the progress?
How do I wait for results I've earned?
What needs re-evaluation in my work/health/finances?
Where do I practice patience with growth?
What skill am I developing through dedicated practice?
How do I find meaning in repetitive work?
Where am I building mastery?
What does 'showing up every day' teach me?
What have I built through my own efforts?
How do I enjoy the fruits of my labor?
Where am I self-sufficient?
What does abundance feel like?
What legacy am I building/inheriting?
How do I define lasting security?
Where do I find abundance in family/community/tradition?
What do I want to leave behind?
What new skill or practical knowledge am I learning?
How do I approach work with fresh eyes?
What opportunity for growth (financial, health, career) is present?
Where can I be more grounded and practical?
Where do I need steady, reliable effort?
How do I balance responsibility with rigidity?
What slow progress am I making?
How do I stay committed to long-term goals?
How do I nurture my physical/material well-being?
Where do I create abundance for myself and others?
How do I embody practical wisdom?
What does grounded, earthy care look like?
How do I master the material world (work, finances, health)?
Where do I build sustainable success?
How do I lead with practical wisdom?
What does financial/physical mastery mean to me?

all_or_nothing_thinking: Where am I seeing only black or white? What's in the gray area?
If I wasn't perfect, am I really a total failure? What evidence contradicts this?
On a scale of 0-10, where do I actually fall?
What would 'good enough' look like instead of perfection?
overgeneralization: I said 'always' or 'never' - is that actually true? What are the exceptions?
How many times has this actually happened vs. how many times have I predicted it?
What's the evidence that this ONE thing means EVERYTHING is ruined?
If this happened to a friend, would I say it means they 'always' fail?
mental_filter: What am I filtering out (the positive) to focus only on the negative?
If I made a list of ALL the evidence, what would be on it?
How much am I magnifying the negative and minimizing the positive?
What would someone outside my head see?
disqualifying_positive: What positive thing happened that I'm dismissing as 'doesn't count'?
Why doesn't it count? Would I say that to someone else?
What if I allowed this good thing to be real and meaningful?
How does disqualifying positives serve me? How does it hurt me?
jumping_to_conclusions: What am I assuming will happen? What's the evidence?
Am I mind-reading (assuming I know what they think)?
What are other possible explanations or outcomes?
catastrophizing: What's the worst that could happen? How likely is that REALLY?
What's the BEST that could happen? What's most LIKELY?
If this did happen, could I survive it? Have I survived worse?
What would I tell a friend who was catastrophizing about this?
emotional_reasoning: I feel _____, therefore I believe _____. Is feeling it the same as it being true?
What's the difference between my feelings and the facts?
What evidence exists outside of my emotions?
How might I feel about this tomorrow? Next week?
should_statements: Who says I 'should'? Where did this rule come from?
What happens when I replace 'should' with 'could' or 'I'd prefer'?
What's the cost of this should vs. the benefit?
What would self-compassion say instead of should?
labeling: I called myself _____. Is that WHO I am or what I DID?
Would I label someone else this harshly for this action?
What's a more accurate, compassionate description?
What would happen if I described the behavior without the label?
personalization: What role did I play? What role did circumstances/others play?
Am I taking too much or too little responsibility?
What percentage is truly my fault vs. other factors?
What would a judge/jury say about responsibility here?

mindfulness_what_skills: OBSERVE: What am I noticing right now (5 senses)? Not judging, just noticing.
DESCRIBE: How would I describe this moment using only facts? No evaluations.
PARTICIPATE: When was I fully absorbed today? When was I holding back?
mindfulness_how_skills: NONJUDGMENTALLY: What judgments am I making? Can I stick to the facts?
ONE-MINDFULLY: What am I doing? Am I doing JUST this, or thinking about 5 other things?
EFFECTIVELY: What works in this situation? Am I prioritizing being right or being effective?
distress_tolerance_tipp: TIPP: Temperature - Can I splash cold water on my face or hold ice?
Intense Exercise - Can I do 10 burpees or run up stairs?
Paced Breathing - Can I breathe slowly (5 in, 5 out)?
Paired Muscle Relaxation - Can I tense and release muscle groups?
distress_tolerance_accepts: Activities - What can I do to distract?
Contributing - How can I help someone else?
Comparisons - Have I survived worse than this?
Emotions (opposite) - What emotion would be opposite to what I feel?
Pushing away - Can I mentally put this aside for now?
Thoughts - Can I count or focus on something neutral?
Sensations - Can I use strong sensations (ice, hot shower) to ground?
distress_tolerance_self_soothe: Vision - What can I look at that's soothing?
Hearing - What music or sounds calm me?
Touch - What texture feels good (soft blanket, warm bath)?
radical_acceptance: What reality am I fighting? What is, whether I like it or not?
What would change if I accepted this completely?
How is refusing to accept this causing me suffering?
What does 'acceptance' NOT mean? (It doesn't mean approval or giving up.)
Can I say 'it is what it is' without bitterness?
emotion_regulation_abc_please: Accumulate positives - What pleasant event can I plan?
Build mastery - What can I do that makes me feel competent?
Cope ahead - What upcoming challenge can I mentally rehearse?
PhysicaL illness - Am I treating illness/pain?
Eating - Am I eating regularly and balanced?
Avoid mood-altering substances - Am I using alcohol/drugs to cope?
Sleep - Am I getting enough quality sleep?
Exercise - Am I moving my body?
opposite_action: What emotion am I feeling? What does it urge me to do?
Is the emotion JUSTIFIED (fits the facts)? Or UNJUSTIFIED?
If unjustified: What would the OPPOSITE action be?
Can I do the opposite ALL THE WAY (action + thoughts + body language)?
(Examples: Fear → Approach. Unjustified anger → Gently avoid/be kind. Shame → Share/don't hide.)
dear_man: Express how I feel about it
give_fast: GIVE (relationship): Be Gentle, act Interested, Validate, use an Easy manner
FAST (self-respect): be Fair, no Apologies (for existing), Stick to values, be Truthful
wise_mind: What does my Emotion Mind say? (All feeling, no logic)
What does my Reasonable Mind say? (All logic, no feeling)
What does my Wise Mind know? (Deep, intuitive knowing that integrates both)
If I sit quietly and ask my Wise Mind, what does it tell me?

mindfulness_integrated_prompts: Right now, what am I aware of in my body? My thoughts? My emotions?
What is this moment asking of me?
What would it be like to be fully HERE instead of lost in thought?
What am I grateful for right now, in this moment?
What is here when I'm not trying to change anything?
Can I notice my thoughts like clouds passing in the sky?
What am I clinging to? What am I pushing away?
How does my breath feel right now? Fast? Slow? Shallow? Deep?
What would it be like to do ONLY this, just for 5 minutes?
Where is my attention? Can I bring it back to now?
What am I resisting about this moment?
If I had beginner's mind, what would I notice?
What is the kindest thing I can do for myself right now?
What does my body need? My heart? My mind?
What am I feeling? Where do I feel it in my body?

anxiety: What am I anxious about? What's the worst, best, and most likely outcome?
What can I control? What can't I control?
What does my anxiety want me to know or do?
What would help me feel safer right now?
What grounding technique would help? (5-4-3-2-1, breathing, body scan)
depression: What small thing can I do today? (Tiny goals only.)
What gave me even a moment of relief or lightness?
What does my depression want me to believe? What's the truth?
If I could be kind to myself right now, what would that look like?
What's one thing I can do to take care of myself?
anger: What am I angry about? What's beneath the anger (hurt, fear, frustration)?
Is this anger justified? What are the facts?
What do I need to do with this anger? (Express, release, channel)
How can I honor this anger without letting it control me?
What would opposite action look like right now?
grief: How does grief feel in my body right now?
What do I need in order to grieve? (Space, support, time)
What am I afraid will happen if I let myself fully feel this?
How do I honor what I've lost while also moving forward?
overwhelm: What is the ONE thing I can do right now? (Not everything, just one.)
What can I let go of? What can wait?
How do I get from feeling buried to just 'busy'?
What boundaries would reduce this overwhelm?
joy: How does joy feel in my body?
Can I let myself fully feel this without waiting for the other shoe to drop?
loneliness: What am I longing for - connection, understanding, companionship?
How can I reach out? (Text a friend, join a group, call family)
What makes me feel less alone?
How do I distinguish loneliness from being alone (which can be restorative)?
shame: Is this shame about WHO I AM or WHAT I DID? (Shame = I am bad. Guilt = I did bad.)
What would Opposite Action be? (Shame → Don't hide, share with safe person)
What would self-compassion say right now?
Have I forgiven others for similar things? Can I forgive myself?

daily_reflection_prompts: What happened today that I want to remember?
What did I do today that I'm proud of?
What challenged me today? How did I respond?
What am I grateful for from today?
What did I learn about myself today?
What emotion was most present today?
What do I need to let go of from today?
What do I want to carry forward into tomorrow?
How did I take care of myself today?
What made me smile or laugh today?
What would I do differently if I had today again?
What am I feeling right now as I reflect on today?
crisis_support_prompts: Right now, in this moment, am I safe?
What is the smallest thing I can do right now to feel more okay?
Who can I call? (Friend, family, crisis line: 988)
What has helped me through crisis before?
What grounding technique can I use RIGHT NOW? (5-4-3-2-1, ice, breathing)
Can I get through the next 5 minutes? (That's all I need to do right now.)
What do I need? (Safety, support, rest, help)
What would my wisest self tell me right now?
What is the TIPP skill I can use? (Temperature, Intense exercise, Paced breathing)
growth_milestone_prompts: How have I grown in the past month?
What pattern have I broken? What new pattern am I building?
What have I learned about myself recently?
What was I afraid of that I've now done?
How is my relationship with myself changing?
What coping skill have I gotten better at?
What boundary have I set that I'm proud of?
What did I think I couldn't survive that I have survived?
What does 'healing' feel like right now?
How would the me from a year ago see me now?
What vision do I have for my future self?

prompt_selection_algorithm.based_on_card_drawn: If user draws a card, offer 3-5 card-specific prompts
prompt_selection_algorithm.based_on_user_mood: If user indicates emotion, offer emotion-state prompts
prompt_selection_algorithm.based_on_recent_journal_themes: AI analyzes recent entries, suggests relevant prompts
prompt_selection_algorithm.based_on_skill_tree_progress: Suggest prompts aligned with current therapeutic focus (CBT/DBT/Mindfulness)
prompt_selection_algorithm.random_deep_dive: Occasionally offer unexpected prompt to break patterns

expressive_writing_protocol.focus: Deepest thoughts and feelings about significant experience
expressive_writing_protocol.evidence: Pennebaker research - improves mental and physical health

thought_records.structure: Situation → Thoughts → Feelings → Alternative Thoughts → New Feelings

gratitude_journaling.structure: 3 good things from today + why they were good
gratitude_journaling.evidence: Seligman research - increases happiness, decreases depression
